CustomField.description: This field stores an encrypted string of all paid 'Overdue Fees' and 'Charges'. No need to add 'Due Fees' because it is being recorded as a part of 'Installment Snapshot' field on the installment.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: This field stores an encrypted string of all paid 'Overdue Fees' and 'Charges'. No need to add 'Due Fees' because it is being recorded as a part of 'Installment Snapshot' field on the installment.
CustomField.label: Fee Snapshot
